description:
My place is only three blocks from Central Park. You’ll love my place because of the vintage industrial style, the light, the neighborhood and the coziness. Its a very safe and quiet neighbourhood. My place is good for couples and solo adventurers.

Bedroom looks out into a pretty and quiet backyard. 
The living room has a wonderful couch, piano, books, and a spacious kitchen with everything you need. 
Space for all your belongings will be provided.

I am usually out of the country when I sublet my space but my former roomate (who knows all the ins and outs of the space) is in the city and available if anything should come up. 
I am also always reachable via phone.

The 6 Train Subway line is literally 2 steps from the front door, as is the crosstown bus.
name: Upper East Side Industrial Chiq Artistic 1 Bedroom
review: The place is very nice and cozy, and Steph has been great receiving and helping us.
